verses.name: Ezekiel 43:8
verses.text: In their setting of their threshold by my thresholds, and their post by my posts, and the wall between me and them, they have even defiled my holy name by their abominations that they have committed: wherefore I have consumed them in mine anger.

verses.name: Ezekiel 43:9
verses.text: Now let them put away their whoredom, and the carcases of their kings, far from me, and I will dwell in the midst of them for ever.

verses.name: Ezekiel 43:10
verses.text: Thou son of man, shew the house to the house of Israel, that they may be ashamed of their iniquities: and let them measure the pattern.
